name: nano-memoize
description: Faster than fast, smaller than micro ... a nano speed and nano size memoizer.

scripts.prepare: cp ./src/nano-memoize.js ./index.js && cp ./src/nano-memoize.js dist/nano-memoize.js && browserify ./src/nano-memoize.js -o browser/nano-memoize.js && uglifyjs browser/nano-memoize.js -o browser/nano-memoize.min.js && uglifyjs src/nano-memoize.js -o dist/nano-memoize.min.js

author: Simon Y. Blackwell <syblackwell@anywhichway.com> (http://www.github.com/anywhichway)
